sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Slider from 'react-slick' import img2 from '../../../assets/img/banner/petani.jpg' import img3 from '../../../assets/img/banner/03.jpg' import img4 from '../../../assets/img/banner/04.jpg' const bannerslide = [ { img: img2, title: "Desa Mandiri Sendangijo", text: 'Desa sendangijo merupakan desa mandiri secara pangan, peternakan, dll', btntext: 'Profil Desa', btntext1: 'Profil Peternakan' }, { img: img3, title: "Take Great Idea To /n Growth Your Business", text: 'Sedut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium /n doloremque laudanti totam raperiaeaque ipsa quaeab', btntext: 'Get Started Now', btntext1: 'Our Services' }, { img: img4, title: "Take Great Idea To /n Growth Your Business", text: 'Sedut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium /n doloremque laudanti totam raperiaeaque ipsa quaeab', btntext: 'Get Started Now', btntext1: 'Our Services' }, ] const SampleNextArrow = (props) => { const { onClick } = props return ( ) } const SamplePrevArrow = (props) => { const { onClick } = props return ( ) } function Banner(props) { const settings = { infinite: true, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 5000, speed: 500, arrows: true, fade: false, dots: false, swipe: true, adaptiveHeight: true, nextArrow: , prevArrow: , responsive: [{ breakpoint: 768, settings: { arrows: false } }], } return (
{bannerslide.map((item, i) => (

{item.title}

{item.text}

  • {item.btntext}
  • {item.btntext1}
))}
); } export default Banner;
